2.0.name: wordpress/buddypress-media
2.0.description:
BuddyPress Media adds Photos, Music, Videos & Albums to your BuddyPress powered social network. Supports mobile devices (Android/iPhone/iPad, etc) and automatic audio/video conversion.

Demo & Code

  • BuddyPress Media Demo (Stand-alone, includes Instagram and Photo tagging addon)
  • BuddyPress Media Kaltura Add-on
  • BuddyPress Media FFMPEG Add-on

Fork BuddyPress Media on GitHub

Features
